memberdef.type: ::System::BaseTypesInfo< BaseType, BaseType1, BaseType2, BaseType3, BaseType4, BaseType5 >
memberdef.definition: typedef ::System::BaseTypesInfo<BaseType, BaseType1, BaseType2, BaseType3, BaseType4, BaseType5> Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::ThisTypeBaseTypesInfo
memberdef.name: ThisTypeBaseTypesInfo

briefdescription.para: Adds to the source rectangle values of the effect extent and returns the final rectangle.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether this shape can overlap other shapes.

detaileddescription.para: This property affects behavior of the shape in Microsoft Word. Aspose.Words ignores the value of this property.
This property is applicable only to top level shapes.
The default value is true.

briefdescription.para: Defines alternative text to be displayed instead of a graphic.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the shape's anchor is locked.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.
Has effect only for top level shapes.
This property affects behavior of the shape's anchor in Microsoft Word. When the anchor is not locked, moving the shape in Microsoft Word can move the shape's anchor too.

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the shape's aspect ratio is locked.

detaileddescription.para: The default value depends on the ShapeType, for the ShapeType.Image it is true but for the other shape types it is false.
Has effect for top level shapes only.

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the shape is below or above text.

detaileddescription.para: Has effect only for top level shapes.
The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets the position of the bottom edge of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points and relative to the shape anchor.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the location and size of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: Ignores aspect ratio lock upon setting.
For a top-level shape, the value is in points and relative to the shape anchor.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.

briefdescription.para: Gets the location and size of the containing block of the shape in points, relative to the anchor of the topmost shape.
Gets final extent that this shape object has after applying drawing effects. Value is measured in points.
Returns true if the shape type allows the shape to have an image.

detaileddescription.para: Although Microsoft Word has a special shape type for images, it appears that in Microsoft Word documents any shape except a group shape can have an image, therefore this property returns true for all shapes except GroupShape.

briefdescription.para: The coordinates at the top-left corner of the containing block of this shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is (0,0).

briefdescription.para: The width and height of the coordinate space inside the containing block of this shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is (1000, 1000).

briefdescription.para: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the document text and the bottom edge of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 0.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the document text and the left edge of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1/8 inch.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the document text and the right edge of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1/8 inch.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the document text and the top edge of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 0.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Gets fill formatting for the shape.
Switches the orientation of a shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.

briefdescription.para: Provides access to the font formatting of this object.
Gets or sets the height of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.
The default value is 0.

briefdescription.para: Specifies how the shape is positioned horizontally.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.
Has effect only for top level floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the full hyperlink address for a shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.
Below are examples of valid values for this property:
Full URI: https://www.aspose.com/.
Full file name: C:\\My Documents\\SalesReport.doc.
Relative URI: %../../../resource.txt
Relative file name: %..\\My Documents\\SalesReport.doc.
Bookmark within another document: https://www.aspose.com/Products/Default.aspx::Suites
Bookmark within this document: %#BookmakName.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether the shape is decorative in the document.
Returns true if this object was deleted in Microsoft Word while change tracking was enabled.
Returns true if this is a group shape.
Returns true if this shape is a horizontal rule.
Returns true if this shape is an image shape.
A quick way to determine if this shape is positioned inline with text.

detaileddescription.para: Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if this object was inserted in Microsoft Word while change tracking was enabled.
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the shape is displayed inside a table or outside of it.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is true.
Has effect only for top level shapes, the property WrapType of which is set to value other than Inline.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if this object was moved (deleted) in Microsoft Word while change tracking was enabled.
Returns true if this object was moved (inserted) in Microsoft Word while change tracking was enabled.
Indicates that shape is a SignatureLine.
Returns true if this shape is not a child of a group shape.
Returns true if this shape is a WordArt object.
Gets or sets the position of the left edge of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points and relative to the shape anchor.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.
The default value is 0.
Has effect only for floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Gets MarkupLanguage used for this graphic object.
Gets or sets the optional shape name.

detaileddescription.para: Default is empty string.
Cannot be null, but can be an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Returns the immediate parent paragraph.
Specifies relative to what the shape is positioned horizontally.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Column.
Has effect only for top level floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Specifies relative to what the shape is positioned vertically.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Paragraph.
Has effect only for top level floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Gets the position of the right edge of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points and relative to the shape anchor.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.

briefdescription.para: Defines the angle (in degrees) that a shape is rotated. Positive value corresponds to clockwise rotation angle.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 0.

briefdescription.para: Defines the text displayed when the mouse pointer moves over the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Gets shadow formatting for the shape.
Gets the shape type.
Gets the size of the shape in points.
Gets or sets the target frame for the shape hyperlink.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the title (caption) of the current shape object.

detaileddescription.para: Default is empty string.
Cannot be null, but can be an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the position of the top edge of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points and relative to the shape anchor.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.
The default value is 0.
Has effect only for floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Specifies how the shape is positioned vertically.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.
Has effect only for top level floating shapes.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the width of the containing block of the shape.

detaileddescription.para: For a top-level shape, the value is in points.
For shapes in a group, the value is in the coordinate space and units of the parent group.
The default value is 0.

briefdescription.para: Specifies how the text is wrapped around the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Both.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Defines whether the shape is inline or floating. For floating shapes defines the wrapping mode for text around the shape.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.
Has effect only for top level shapes.

briefdescription.para: Determines the display order of overlapping shapes.

detaileddescription.para: Has effect only for top level shapes.
The default value is 0.
The number represents the stacking precedence. A shape with a higher number will be displayed as if it were overlapping (in "front" of) a shape with a lower number.
The order of overlapping shapes is independent for shapes in the header and in the main text of the document.
The display order of child shapes in a group shape is determined by their order inside the group shape.

briefdescription.para: Creates and returns an object that can be used to render this shape into an image.

detaileddescription.para: This method just invokes the ShapeRenderer constructor and passes this object as a parameter.

briefdescription.para: Converts a value from the local coordinate space into the coordinate space of the parent shape.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_AllowOverlap.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_AlternativeText.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_AnchorLocked.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_AspectRatioLocked.

Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Bounds.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_CoordOrigin.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_CoordSize.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_DistanceBottom.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_DistanceLeft.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_DistanceRight.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_DistanceTop.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_FlipOrientation.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Height.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_HorizontalAlignment.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_HRef.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_IsDecorative.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_IsLayoutInCell.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Left.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Name.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_RelativeHorizontalPosition.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_RelativeVerticalPosition.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Rotation.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_ScreenTip.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Target.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Title.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Top.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_VerticalAlignment.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_Width.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_WrapSide.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_WrapType.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::ShapeBase::get_ZOrder.
Base class for objects in the drawing layer, such as an AutoShape, freeform, OLE object, ActiveX control, or picture.

detaileddescription.para: This is an abstract class. The two derived classes that you can instantiate are Shape and GroupShape.
A shape is a node in the document tree.
If the shape is a child of a Paragraph object, then the shape is said to be "top-level". Top-level shapes are measured and positioned in points.

A shape can also occur as a child of a GroupShape object when several shapes are grouped. Child shapes of a group shape are positioned in the coordinate space and units defined by the CoordSize and CoordOrigin properties of the parent group shape.
A shape can be positioned inline with text or floating. The positioning method is controlled using the WrapType property.

When a shape is floating, it is positioned relative to something (e.g the current paragraph, the margin or the page). The relative positioning of the shape is specified using the RelativeHorizontalPosition and RelativeVerticalPosition properties.
A floating shape be positioned explicitly using the Left and Top properties or aligned relative to some other object using the HorizontalAlignment and VerticalAlignment properties.
